messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] The biggest spiders in the world
messages.msgSnippet: Alright, I ll settle this spider thing once and for all... ***Everyone*** knows that the biggest spider in the world is on Gilligan s Island. Sure, remember?
messages.messageBody:
Alright, I'll settle this spider thing once and for
all...

***Everyone*** knows that the biggest spider in the
world is on Gilligan's Island. Sure, remember? How the
great big black hairy spider had Gilligan and the
Skipper trapped in that cave?

Who says you can't learn from TV?

I'm sorry ... I've had a really bad morning and I'm
just trying to amuse myself.

Shelly

=====
"Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever does." -- Margaret Mead
